Class SyncTracker

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.imperial.vazels.reef.client.managers.SyncTracker

public class SyncTracker
extends java.lang.Object

Keep track of the synchronisation state of a manager.

Constructor Detail

SyncTracker

public SyncTracker(IManager tracking)
Create the default tracker. This assumes we don't have server data or local changes.

Parameters:
tracking - The manager that we are tracking for.

SyncTracker

public SyncTracker(IManager tracking,
                   boolean serverData,
                   boolean localChanges)
Create the sync tracker with specific values for local and server changes.

Parameters:
tracking - The manager that we are tracking for.
serverData - Do we have the server data?
localChanges - Do we have any local changes?
Method Detail

hasServerData

public boolean hasServerData()
Have we recorded receiving the server data?

Returns:
true if we think we have the server data.

hasLocalChanges

public boolean hasLocalChanges()
Have we recorded changing anything locally?

Returns:
true if we have changed something locally.

Called to indicate that we have changed something locally.

public void serverChange()
Called when we suspect the server has changed.

Called when the local data has been pushed to the server.

Called whenever local changes are wiped.

addChangeHandler

public void addChangeHandler(ManagerChangeHandler handler)
Adds a change handler to this tracker.

Parameters:
handler - Handler to add.

removeChangeHandler

public void removeChangeHandler(ManagerChangeHandler handler)
Removes a change handler from this tracker.

Parameters:
handler - Handler to remove if it exists.

addServerDataCallback

public void addServerDataCallback(PullCallback callback)
Add a callback to the waiting list. As soon as we know we have the server data, this is called.

Parameters:
callback - The callback to be called.

processWaitingList

protected void processWaitingList()
Called whenever we retrieve server data to fire off the waiting callbacks
